casebody.data:
IN RE ROBERT E. WHITTON REVOCABLE TRUST. Molly Michaluk, Petitioner-Appellant,
v.
Eddie Whitton and Richard Whitton, Successor Trustees of the Robert E. Whitton Revocable Trust, Respondents-Appellees. SC: 158408
COA: 337828 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 3, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of respondents-appellees to extend the time for filing their supplemental brief is GRANTED. The supplemental brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before October 1, 2019.
